thread.title: Conley's only FG leads Grizzlies past Hawks, 82-81
thread.title_full: Conley's only FG leads Grizzlies past Hawks, 82-81

title: Conley's only FG leads Grizzlies past Hawks, 82-81
text: Close Image 1 of 5 Atlanta Hawks guard Kent Bazemore (24) goes up for a shot against Memphis Grizzlies center Ryan Hollins (20) in the first half of an NBA preseason basketball game Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015, in Atlanta. Atlanta Hawks guard Kent Bazemore (24) goes up for a shot against Memphis Grizzlies center Ryan Hollins (20) in the first half of an NBA preseason basketball game Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015, in Atlanta. Photo: John Bazemore, AP Image 2 of 5 Atlanta Hawks guard Dennis Schroder (17) is fouled by Memphis Grizzlies guard Beno Udrih (19) as he goes to the basket in the first half of an NBA preseason basketball game Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015, in Atlanta. Atlanta Hawks guard Dennis Schroder (17) is fouled by Memphis Grizzlies guard Beno Udrih (19) as he goes to the basket in the first half of an NBA preseason basketball game Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015, in Atlanta. Photo: John Bazemore, AP Image 3 of 5 Memphis Grizzlies center Marc Gasol (33) holds his wrist after being fouled in the first half of an NBA preseason basketball game against the Atlanta Hawks Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015, in Atlanta. Memphis Grizzlies center Marc Gasol (33) holds his wrist after being fouled in the first half of an NBA preseason basketball game against the Atlanta Hawks Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015, in Atlanta. Photo: John Bazemore, AP Image 4 of 5 Atlanta Hawks forward Paul Millsap (4) passes the ball as he drives past Memphis Grizzlies center Marc Gasol (33) in the first half of an NBA preseason basketball game Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015, in Atlanta. Atlanta Hawks forward Paul Millsap (4) passes the ball as he drives past Memphis Grizzlies center Marc Gasol (33) in the first half of an NBA preseason basketball game Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015, in Atlanta. Photo: John Bazemore, AP Image 5 of 5 Memphis Grizzlies forward Jarnell Stokes (1) pulls down a rebound against Atlanta Hawks forward Tiago Splitter (11) in the first half of an NBA preseason basketball game Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015, in Atlanta. Memphis Grizzlies forward Jarnell Stokes (1) pulls down a rebound against Atlanta Hawks forward Tiago Splitter (11) in the first half of an NBA preseason basketball game Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015, in Atlanta. Photo: John Bazemore, AP Conley's only FG leads Grizzlies past Hawks, 82-81 1 / 5 Back to Gallery ATLANTA (AP) — Mike Conley hit a 3-pointer with 53 seconds remaining, Zach Randolph scored 19 points and the Memphis Grizzlies remained unbeaten in the preseason with an 82-81 win over the Atlanta Hawks on Wednesday night. Both teams rallied from double-digit deficits, the Hawks going ahead 77-76 on Paul Millsap 's 3-pointer from the corner with 1:07 to go. Conley responded with a 3 of his own for Memphis (6-0) — his only field goal of the night. GRIZZLIES: Randolph also had 13 rebounds. HAWKS: Kent Bazemore led with 18 points. ... Al Horford had 13 points and 14 rebounds. LIKE THE REAL THING: Both teams had starters on the court at the end, giving the game a regular-season feel. UP NEXT: The Hawks play their preseason finale Friday at Detroit, a preview of their regular season opener. The Grizzlies also close the preseason Friday, traveling to Orlando to take on the Magic. Southeast Texas sports news
